articles.author: Saloni Kothari
articles.title: BSE Sensex Rejig: Adani Ports To Replace Wipro In June - NDTV Profit
articles.description: The Asia Index Pvt. on Friday announced reconstitution results for its indices, which is effective from open on June 24.
articles.content: Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone Ltd. will be included in the S&P BSE Sensex from June 24, replacing IT major Wipro Ltd. from the index, as part of the reconstitution of the S&P BSE indi… [+1708 chars]
